model_prompts.structured_summary_prompt:
Create an ADHD-friendly summary using EXACTLY this format (no extra headers or markdown):

**TL;DR:** [One clear sentence] (Source)

**KEY POINTS:**
• [First point] (Source)
• [Second point] (Source)
• [Third point] (Source)

**FULL SUMMARY:** [2-3 sentences providing complete overview]

**SOURCES:** [List of sources used]

IMPORTANT RULES:
- No markdown headers (###, ##)
- No extra formatting
- Use intelligent source references like (Abstract), (Introduction), (Section 2.1), (Methods), (Results), (Conclusion)
- For unclear sections, use (Para X) where X is paragraph number
- For video/audio, use [HH:MM:SS] timestamps
- Keep content concise and ADHD-friendly
- Follow the exact format above
model_prompts.text_processing_prompt: Analyze this text content and provide a structured ADHD-friendly summary with TL;DR, key points, and full summary sections.
model_prompts.pdf_processing_prompt: Extract and analyze this PDF content, then provide a structured ADHD-friendly summary with TL;DR, key points, and full summary sections.
model_prompts.video_processing_prompt: Analyze this video transcript and provide a structured ADHD-friendly summary with TL;DR, key points, and full summary sections.
model_prompts.audio_processing_prompt: Analyze this audio transcript and provide a structured ADHD-friendly summary with TL;DR, key points, and full summary sections. Focus on key information and actionable insights from the audio content.
